attributes.action: Make all NHS prescriptions free of charge to everyone in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: To make the access to health care the same across the country, at the moment people are not getting the drugs they need because they don't qualify for free prescriptions and they can't afford to pay the charges for each item a Doctor decides they need. Its an unfair system affecting only people living in England.
attributes.background: Make the NHS equal to all UK citizens regardless of where they live, at the moment prescriptions are free to all in Scotland and Wales, taking into consideration that most tax for the NHS to pay for this is raised in England make them free in England too, Its a National Health Service not regional.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Abolish prescription fees:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592147
